name: Facebook without timeline (alpha version)
description: Facebook without timeline. I want to go there to see notifications and messages only, and this plugin is to avoid seeing the addictive timeline steam
additional_info:
You won't see nothing but the top blue bar where the logo, search and notification icons are. But when you click on those icons (friends request, message or notification) you will be able to see that.

You may have to change #topnews_main_stream_408239535924329 to your personal code, I'm not sure if it will work directly for other users. You can find it by viewing the source code.
